Articles.Content: been playing since last summer, and I like to say I've gotten pretty good at not killing Kerbals. and now I even have a forum account.

Welcome to the forums. I have also been playing since last summer but I'm not so great at not killing kerbals. I'm afraid of leaving the kerbin mun-minmus system as I know that rescue in interplanetary space is hard.
Welcome to the forums! And no, you're not late.

I'm afraid of leaving the kerbin mun-minmus system as I know that rescue in interplanetary space is hard.
Send probes.

Send probes.

send probes on collision courses with planets.
You are not late, infact the game is still in development and would take a couple of years before it will be finished (no offense intended towards the developers).

Send probes.

Already tried that one sent to Jool other to Duna.

Jool one aerobrake successfully then lithographs on laythe 5 years to early

Duna one got set up for 7 km aerobrake pass surprisingly Ike doesn't mind maybe because it knew I was going to crash aerobrake to low and smashed into the ground.

http://i.imgur.com/VdxJjWt.png

send probes on collision courses with planets.

Oh this is embarrassing someone who has only been on the forums for a few hours already knows how to put screenshots whereas I've been on the forums for 3 months and I don't know how to put screenshots into posts

Oh this is embarrassing someone who has only been on the forums for a few hours already knows how to put screenshots whereas I've been on the forums for 3 months and I don't know how to put screenshots into posts

It's basic HTML and works in many if not most forums: use the [ IMG ] [ /IMG ] tags around your image address.

Welcome to the forums!

I've been playing since 0.18.2 - January 2013 - which I consider to be pretty fair with regards to experience. So joining in the summer is sort of new. I consider myself a veteran, but then again those who have been playing since the 0.13 days probably think of me as a noob! :-)
Commander Jebidiah, upload your screenshots to a free hosting site like Imgur.com, then copy/paste the link they provide in your post.
Welcome to the friendliest corner of the web!
Welcome! This forum is the best one there is.

Hello! I have nothing else to say! But not really! I like using exclamation marks!

I, too, hate sending Kerbals out of the Kerbin system. Even in Sandbox mode, they have never gone past Minmus. So you're not alone.

But I have gone and sent probes. Solar orbits, Duna, Eve, and Jool surface probes, and a few rovers.

So, welcome to our humble forums.
Probes. the way to go on one way and dangerous missions.

been playing since last summer, and I like to say I've gotten pretty good at not killing Kerbals. and now I even have a forum account.

No, would you like to be?
